items.title: AWS
items.description: Software development roles across AWS EC2 and Amazon, focused on forecasting platforms and data pipelines.
achievements: EC2 metrics ETL pipeline: 100 GB throughput, data aggregation time from 1 hour to 15 minutes
Forecasting pipelines for EC2, S3, and EBS informing multi-billion-dollar CapEx decisions
Architected RESTful API on DynamoDB and EC2, streamlining hundreds of internal forecasting workflows
Automated ML job deployment and scheduling for economists, reducing deploy time from 2 days to 1 hour

seasons.title: Software Development Engineer II, AWS EC2

episodes.title: Global Datacenter Metrics ETL
episodes.description: Designed and implemented next-generation metrics ETL for EC2
achievements: 100 GB throughput; aggregation time reduced from 1 hour to 15 minutes
episodes.impact: Improved global observability and capacity planning

episodes.title: Time Series Forecasting Pipelines
episodes.description: Built forecasting for EC2, S3, and EBS with GPU and CPU segmentation
achievements: Delivered insights for multi-billion-dollar CapEx decisions
episodes.impact: Enabled targeted capacity investments by leadership

episodes.title: Forecasting API Service
episodes.description: Architected a RESTful API backed by DynamoDB and EC2
achievements: Streamlined hundreds of internal forecasting workflows
episodes.impact: Improved access to forecasting data across teams

episodes.title: Intern Mentorship
episodes.description: Mentored a student intern on an internal webpage with IAM permissions
achievements: Guided implementation to successful project completion
Designed and implemented EC2's next-generation global datacenter metrics ETL pipeline, achieving 100 GB throughput and reducing data aggregation time from 1 hour to 15 minutes
Developed time series forecasting pipelines for AWS EC2, S3, and EBS services, enhancing capabilities to separately forecast GPU and CPU demand
Provided leadership with actionable insights through visualizations and analyses, informing multi-billion dollar CapEx decisions
Architected a scalable RESTful API service using DynamoDB and EC2, streamlining hundreds of internal forecasting workflows
Mentored a student intern in developing an internal webpage, managing complex IAM permissions and guiding implementation

seasons.title: Software Development Engineer I, Amazon

episodes.title: ML Job Deployment & Scheduling

achievements: Reduced model deployment time from 2 days to 1 hour

achievements: Improved model deployment and iteration speed

Designed and implemented an automated ML job deployment and scheduling service from scratch for economists, reducing model deployment time from 2 days to 1 hour and enabling version control for reproducibility
Collaborated closely with data scientists to optimize and deploy forecasting ML models

items.title: Yonder

Built asynchronous queue-based messaging for internal applications
